Description: The PQ values (15-minute values) shall be delivered at the latest within 4 hours from registration in the Metering Units to HES
Extended type approval and certification of Metering Devices shall be carried out according to method SPM 1618, test with 12 kV surge voltage.
A serial number on a Communication Module shall be positioned so that it is not visible on the front of the Metering Unit.
The manufacturing number of the meter shall be placed on a non-removable part (not connection cover, not communication module cover, etc.).

In HES there should be functionality for automatic and manual administration:
- Installation of new Metering Unit
- Replacement of the Metering Unit
- Decommissioning of Metering Unit
HES shall be able to make and receive web service calls.
The date and system time shall be recorded for each logged record.
Authentication shall be used when the Metering System interacts with neighboring systems.

Feature: View meters with communication problems in map
Description: In HES, it should be possible to visualize Metering Units with communication problems in a graphical view/map that can be zoomed in and out.
It shall be possible for the User to be able to copy static fields in HES such as headers, status, responses to Events in the system.
Configuration of the Metering Device from HES shall be possible without downloading new Firmware.
The metering system and surrounding infrastructure located within GE's network shall be synchronized with GE controlled NTP.
The Contractor shall carry out the necessary training and submit the relevant documentation in accordance with Clause 5 prior to the commencement of the Purchaser's UAT.
The Supplier shall be present at the Purchaser's premises and assist the Purchaser in carrying out the UAT.

Feature: Requirements for delivery and installation in the production environment
Description:
During installation and commissioning of the Metering System in the Customer's production environment, the Supplier shall: 
-install, 
-if necessary configure/parameterize, 
-if necessary migrate structural data, 
-commission, 
-verify and test the Metering System including integrations in the production environment, and 
-perform error corrections and retests
